content: Initial screening call. Candidate showed strong technical skills and enthusiasm for the role. Discussed salary expectations ($120-140k). Available for next round interview.
Sent technical assessment link. Candidate confirmed receipt and mentioned they'll complete it by end of week.
In-person interview scheduled. Candidate impressed the team with problem-solving approach. Technical skills validated. Moving to final round with hiring manager.
Following up on product manager position. Candidate still interested and available for next steps. Scheduling final interview with VP of Product.
Reference check completed. Former manager provided excellent feedback on design skills and collaboration. Ready to extend offer.
Sent rejection email with detailed feedback. Encouraged candidate to apply for future openings. Added to talent pool for similar roles.
